content: Trying to run the latest ig publisher. I am geting a null pointer exception on line 573 of Publisher.jar in igtools. It appears that lloyd made some changes to that line 6 hours ago, and am wondering if maybe it was unintentially broken. Or maybe there is something different I need to do now? Anyone have any idea what's up?

@Grahame Grieve - I waited for "FHIR STU3 Candidate (v1.7.0-10443)" to appear in the footer and tried downloading the IG Publisher, but it's only 3 MB instead of 38 MB. Is there a problem with the downloading or with the IG Publisher?
@Grahame Grieve - I've tried downloading the IG Publisher a few times and get different sized files (3.3MB, 3.0MB and 3.9MB), so does that suggest an issue with the downloader?
When I download with wget at least it's able to resume broken downloads where it left off...
